title: Raillery defeated by calm reason, or, The new Cartesian method of arguing and answering expos'd in a letter to all lovers of science, candor and civility / by J.S.
author: Sergeant, John, 1622-1707.
publisher: Printed for D. Brown ... and A. Roper ...,
notes: Imperfect: pages stained and with some print show-through.
